mintonetteCup.title: Mintonette Cup
mintonetteCup.descri: Montpellier hosts the Mintonette Cup, the world volleyball tournament bringing together the best players!

burgerStand.title: Burger Stand
burgerStand.description:
Good news! The burger stand will be present at the Mintonette Cup.
You will find a wide selection to satisfy all tastes: delicious classic burgers,
gourmet creations, and vegetarian options so everyone can enjoy.

Whether you are a meat lover or prefer lighter alternatives, everyone will be warmly welcomed. It's the perfect opportunity to share a friendly moment over a good meal while enjoying the event!

modal.connexion:
Login successful! 
 Happy to see you back on the court.
modal.inscription:
Registration complete! 
 Welcome to the volleyball adventure.

PresentationMintonette.title: WHO ARE WE?
PresentationMintonette.texte1: The great world Volleyball tournament Mintonette Cup is coming to Montpellier! Our third edition promises to be amazing.
PresentationMintonette.texte2: Are you a sports enthusiast, do you love following major sporting events that bring together passionate fans and a great atmosphere? The Mintonette Cup awaits you!
PresentationMintonette.texte3: On the agenda: thrilling matches, an amazing audience and a bustling atmosphere.
PresentationMintonette.texte4: We look forward to seeing you in the stands!

blocInfo.descriEdition: The Mintonette Cup, now hosted in Montpellier, has seen remarkable growth and has become one of the major events for amateur volleyball in the South of France. The previous edition gathered nearly 15,000 spectators over three days, thanks to the appeal of Montpellier’s facilities and the city’s strong volleyball culture, notably supported by Montpellier Hérault Sport Club Volleyball.
blocInfo.descriPratiquants: This is the number of people playing volleyball, whether for leisure, school programs, or at a high level. This makes volleyball one of the most popular team sports in the world, just behind football.
blocInfo.descriPays: This is the number of countries where volleyball is represented today through various clubs, competitions, and national federations. The International Volleyball Federation (FIVB) has over 220 member federations, showing the sport's global reach and presence.
blocInfo.descriAudience: This was the peak viewership recorded for a volleyball match in 2024, demonstrating the growing public interest in the sport. International competitions attract millions of viewers and increase volleyball’s visibility.
blocInfo.descriReseauxSociaux: This is the number of social media interactions related to the previous edition of the Mintonette Cup. The organizers hope to exceed 300,000 online views this year, further boosting its visibility. Social media were not left behind !

footer.remerciement: WITH THE COLLABORATION AND A BIG THANK YOU TO:

prestataire.title: Competition Service Providers Management
prestataire.descri:
Welcome to the administration area dedicated to service providers involved in our volleyball events. 
Here, you can view all the services offered: catering, entertainment, shops, and services for teams and spectators. Pending requests must be approved before the provider can operate on the field or in event areas. 
This management ensures an optimal and safe experience for all participants.
prestataire.nb_presta: There are {count} service provider(s) pending approval.
prestataire.nb_prestaVide: All service providers are ready for the field and event areas: the competition can proceed smoothly!
prestataire.messageSuppr: is no longer part of the competition’s service providers.
prestataire.messageRefus: The provider has been declined and marked as inactive in the competition.

user.title: User Management
user.descri: Welcome to the user administration area. Here, you can view, manage, and delete registered accounts. This page ensures platform security and proper functionality by allowing only valid users to access its features. Deleting a user is permanent, so please double-check the information before confirming.
